thread.title: BRIEF-Envestnet Reports Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.40

title: BRIEF-Envestnet Reports Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.40
text: 12 PM / Updated 3 minutes ago BRIEF-Envestnet Reports Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.40 Reuters Staff Feb 22 (Reuters) - Envestnet Inc: * ENVESTNET REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.40 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.38 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 18 PERCENT TO $182.9 MILLION * SEES Q1 2018 REVENUES $192.0 MILLION TO $195.0 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 REVENUES $808.0 MILLION TO $823.0 MILLION * SEES Q1 2018 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.36 * SEES FY 2018 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.78-$1.83 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.39, REVENUE VIEW $179.1 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.80, REVENUE VIEW $794.6 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.38, REVENUE VIEW $185.8 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
